participant_1.background:
I'd brag about my ability to sing, even though I have asthma and can't sing in a choir anymore.
i work as a lifeguard.
I procrastinate on my lesson plans.
i secretly love my long deployments , because it gets me away from conventional life.
I wish I could be more active, but I love to cuddle with my cats on the couch.

participant_2.background:
I spent my last birthday building a new deck for my house.
My parents were always busy with work, so I had to get a job early to help make ends meet.
i like the movie godfather.
my favorite band is vv nation.
i always wear something purple.

content.text: What are some of your hobbies?
I like to build things, I spend my last birthday building a new deck for my house.
That is amazing! I love building things too, but I'm not as handy as you are.
I have to be, my parents were always busy with work, so I had to get a job early to help make ends meet.
Oh, I'm sorry to hear that. I'm glad you were able to find a way to make some money though.
It was tough, but it taught me a lot.
I bet it did. Are there any other things you like to do?
I like to watch movies, my favorite is The Godfather.
I've never seen that movie, is it good?
It's one of my favorites, it's a classic!
I'll have to check it out sometime. What's your favorite band?
My favorite band is VV Nation, I love their music.
I've never heard of them, what kind of music do they play?
They're a rock band, they have a lot of energy and their songs are really catchy.
Sounds like I'll have to check them out too. I'm always looking for new music to listen to.
